title: Philadelphia’s Rob Thomson Makes the Right Calls in World Series Game 1
description: Determined to capitalize on his team’s momentum, Phillies Manager Rob Thomson went to his top relievers early in Game 1. The moves paid off with a win on the road.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:credit: Troy Taormina/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Manager Rob Thomson’s aggressive use of his bullpen paid off in Game 1 of the World Series.
